Thunderstorm Advisory No. 13 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 1:46 PM, 17 June 2025(Tuesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Tarlac, Bataan and Pampanga within the next 2 hours.



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Zambales(Santa Cruz, Candelaria, Palauig, Iba, Botolan, Cabangan, San Antonio, Subic, Castillejos), Metro Manila(Malabon, Valenzuela, Navotas), Bulacan(Bulakan, Obando, Meycauayan, Marilao, Norzagaray, San Jose del Monte), Cavite(Ternate, Maragondon, Naic, Tanza, Alfonso, Tagaytay, Indang, Mendez, Magallanes, General Emilio Aguinaldo), Rizal(Rodriguez), Batangas(Nasugbu, Tuy, Calaca, Balayan, San Nicolas, Talisay, Agoncillo, Lemery, Laurel, Tanauan, Santo Tomas, Malvar, Balete, Mataasnakahoy, Lipa, Cuenca, San Jose), Laguna(Calamba), Quezon(Sariaya) and Nueva Ecija(Santa Rosa, Cabanatuan) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
